name: RED in The Wrong Part of Town.
name_original: RED in The Wrong Part of Town.
description:
Made in a few days by Rowan

(Music by Astro)

(also thanks to SlickRamen for helping me learn how to use NG api :))

Planned update:

I'm currently waiting for a new version of the Newgrounds API for GameMaker,

In the next update there will be:

  • Extra unlockable palettes
  • More enemy types
  • More gun / bullet variations

-

If you have any ideas for what could be added or changed feel free to comment below

(I will read everything probably ^^)
